name: Trial Dungeon
description:
This game was inspired by another game called "Fireball Dungeon". You can view and play it here. This is a reimagination of "Fireball Dungeon" as an simple arcade avoid-getting-hit game. Here you can check out the competition and other entries.

In Trial Dungeon you can use some powerups to help you get to the next level:

- Stop watch: Stop all enemies for 6 seconds.

- Cloak: Makes the heroine invencible for 6 seconds.

- Spiderweb: Leaves a spider web that can trap enemies and fireballs. It lasts for 12 seconds.

- Shield: Gives the heorine a shield that can protect her from fireballs. It lasts for 12 seconds.

Open the chests (by standing in it) until you get the key to open the door and advance to the next level. You can improve your score by opening the chests and collecting lives. Use arrow keys to control the heroine and Space to activate the powerups.

Created with PureBasic. The source code is available you can compile it with the demonstration version of purebasic.
